Articles.Content:
Hey so I'm trying to finish challenges to gain money but some of the challenges just don't work! All of the checks will be there but they don't stay. Am I just doing something wrong or is it glitching out? It happens fairly frequently..

(xbox one)

thanks to anyone who replies

I suppose you mean missions. 

Some missions ask you to do something when all conditions are met. In  this case when you are in a particular condition it will have a check mark but if later the condition  change the check mark is gone. 

Just check the fine print to figure out what are you missing.
Ya my bad, missions, and thanks

Since you are on a console, I understand that it's difficult/impossible to post a screenshot. But if you could type in an example of exactly what the text next to the checkmarks said, and what your rocket did, we could help more. As Spricigo said, the fine print in the contract tells you exactly what you have to do -- so something you are doing isn't quite right. It's not glitching.

Oh my god I'm an idiot... 

while taking a closer look I noticed that I read Mk12-R as Mk2-R....

wow..

Hey @Jebodiah, could you do me a quick favor?

In your Pause menu, at the bottom -- what's your exact version? Is it 1.1.0 (1159)?
I'll get back to you in a bit, at the moment we have guests over and the Xbox isn't available.
ok so sorry for the long wait but i have version 1.1.0.1180
